Counter-Strike:Global Offensive.
This is a game of emotions, where everyone is rooting for their favorite team,for example ,I'm rooting for the team Virtus Pro,Na'vi,fnatic, FaZe. Rekomnduyu all this game it gives you and emotions of victory and loss, emotions that your teammate begins to offend you, etc.
I have been playing this game for over 15 years now and it never gets old. Great fun, lots of action, and a great community.
